All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.axis.Handler, java.io.Serializable
public class AxisHeaderContextProcessor
extends org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler

The class is used to perform WS-Transaction context insertion and extraction for application level SOAP messages on the Apache AXIS platform.
